snippet: Russia has a reputation for crazy motorists and stupefying traffic accidents, leading many drivers to install dashboard cameras, which document every minute on the road.
lead_paragraph: Russia has a reputation for crazy motorists and stupefying traffic accidents, leading many drivers to install dashboard cameras, which document every minute on the road.

headline.main: Dashboard Cameras, Meant to Record Accidents and Mayhem, Capture Cosmic Event
headline.print_headline: Dashcams, Meant to Record Accidents and Mayhem, Capture Cosmic Event
